item.title: IntrCity SmartBus lands $30M at $140M valuation to deepen its grip on India’s intercity travel market
item.description: IntrCity SmartBus grew revenue by 67% last year and is targeting full profitability this year, as intercity travel booms across India.

item.title: India’s Snabbit valuation doubled to $180M in 5 months on its quick house-help bet
item.description: Snabbit has raised its third funding round in nine months.

item.title: Cluely’s Roy Lee on the ragebait strategy for startup marketing
item.description: Cluely's Roy Lee has a message for startup founders: you should be thinking harder about how to go viral.

item.title: Digg founder Kevin Rose on the need for trusted social communities in the AI era
